    R

    random - Variable in class entity.Character
    Random generator for probability calculations.
    refreshList() - Method in class ui.InventoryView
    Refreshes the inventory list with current data.
    resetEnemyToIdle() - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Resets the enemy image to the idle state.
    resetLog() - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Clears the battle log.
    resetPlayerToIdle() - Method in class ui.BattleView
    Resets the player image to the idle state.
    ResourceManager - Class in utils
    Manages the loading and caching of image resources.
    ResourceManager() - Constructor for class utils.ResourceManager
     
    Revolver - Class in items.weapon
    Represents a revolver handgun.

    Constructor to initialize the Revolver by using super("Revolver", 80, 0.40, 2.5, 180, 90, WeaponType.GUN).

    RottenZombie - Class in entity
    A decaying zombie that inflicts poison on attack and weak to SHARP weapons.
    RottenZombie() - Constructor for class entity.RottenZombie
    Initialize a Rotten Zombie by using super(170, 25, 5, 0.1, 1.5, 0.0).
    RunnerZombie - Class in entity
    A fast zombie that can increase its dodge chance and weak to GUN weapons.
    RunnerZombie() - Constructor for class entity.RunnerZombie
    Initialize a Runner Zombie by using super(200, 30, 10, 0.25, 1.75, 0.4).
